H0.text: Which town stands on the River Aare, between the lakes of Brienz and Thun. Bern

H1.text: Which town stands on the River Aare, between the lakes of Brienz and Thun. Thun

H2.text: Which town stands on the River Aare, between the lakes of Brienz and Thun. Brienz

H3.text: Which town stands on the River Aare, between the lakes of Brienz and Thun. Interlaken

A4.text: Interlaken is located on flat alluvial land called BÃ¶deli between two lakes, Brienz to the east and Thun to the west, and alongside the river Aare, which flows between them.

A5.text: The town takes its name from its geographical position between the lakes (in Latin inter lacus).
